msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 4171; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; almost regularly cut at the top. There is a vertical long lacuna from the middle downwards to the end at the left side of the column. There are some verticals a result of vertical folds. Kollesis is at the end of some taxpayer���s names. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. In a few cases of this column the scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer. The scribe wrote some words on the verso, presumably as a draft.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
